key.chatnotifier.settings.ignoreSelfDesc: §6* Might not work in some servers.
key.chatnotifier.settings.matchSelfNameD:
For example, if your nickname is Foo,
then messages containing Foo will be matched.
key.chatnotifier.settings.ignoreSystemMe:
§6* Not recommended to be enabled in servers,
§6especially those with chat plugins installed
(unexpected errors may occur).
key.chatnotifier.settings.toastNotifyDes:
§6* In-development feature, may not work.
§rWhen Minecraft is running in the background, you will be alerted
with a Toast Notification when you receive a concern message.
key.chatnotifier.settings.highlightDescr: Please use "&" for color code prefix, and "\&" for "&".
key.chatnotifier.settings.highlightPrefi: Please use "&" for color code prefix, and "\&" for "&".
key.chatnotifier.toast.title: Message from Minecraft:
